pages.text: The $(mob)Mule$() is the offspring of a $(l:minecraft_horse)$(mob)Horse$() and a $(l:minecraft_donkey)$(mob)Donkey$(). Like the latter, it cannot wear armor but can be equipped with a $(item)Chest$() to transport items.$(p)Unlike its parents, a $(mob)Mule$() is always sterile, and as such cannot breed.
